about_the_game:
This is a demo sequence that takes place midway throught the full game. It may be subject to change before the full release. This demo was previously playable at PAX AUS 2022

Uncover the Mystery
Outpost Rhea is a privately owned space station on the edge of human explored space built by the Terra-Caelum corporation to explore deep space anomalies and perform practical application experiments. When the Player controlled custodian bots power up to discover the station abandoned and in disrepair they'll need to work together if they want to save the station and discover the series of events that led to the crew's disappearance.

Communication based puzzles
Players must work together and communicate to solve a series of challenging, mind bending, non Euclidian puzzles. Communication is an essential part of Regolith as you can't know for sure that your perception of reality will match that of the other player.

Non Euclidian Space
The rules of space and time are breaking down on board Outpost Rhea. Walk on the ceiling or pass through an infinitely looping gateway.
